abstract: New York Mets general manager Sandy Alderson attends news conference announcing Mike Piazza's Hall of Fame induction, his first public appearance since undergoing cancer treatment; defends team's off-season roster changes.
lead_paragraph: Mets General Manager Sandy Alderson, who is being treated for cancer, made his first public appearance since collapsing during a news media briefing in November.

headline.print_headline: Alderson, Recovering From Cancer, Defends Mets’ Moves
